test_plan.test_scope: Comprehensive frontend testing for landing page including functional, accessibility, performance, security, and cross-browser compatibility

tests.name: Landing Page Renders Successfully
tests.description: Verify that the home route '/' renders without client-side errors or console warnings
steps: Check for JavaScript errors in console
tests.expected_result: Page loads successfully with no console errors

tests.name: Hero Section Displays Correctly
tests.description: Verify Hero section displays headline, subheadline, and primary CTA linking to /contact
steps: Check primary CTA button exists and links to /contact
tests.expected_result: Hero section displays with all required elements and CTA links to /contact

tests.name: Social Proof Logos Display
tests.description: Verify social proof section displays at least 4 logos with non-empty alt text
steps: Verify each logo has alt text
tests.expected_result: At least 4 logos displayed with descriptive alt text

tests.name: Services Cards Display and Navigate
tests.description: Verify services section displays at least 3 cards, each clickable and focusable
steps: Verify each card has title, description, and icon
Test keyboard navigation to each card
tests.expected_result: Services section shows 6 cards, all clickable and keyboard accessible

tests.name: Technology Stack Display
tests.description: Verify technology stack lists at least 6 technologies with accessible labels
tests.expected_result: At least 6 technologies displayed with proper labels

tests.name: Case Study Spotlight
tests.description: Verify case study section includes KPI tile and deep-link to /case-studies/techflow
steps: Check deep-link to case study page
tests.expected_result: Case study spotlight displays with KPI tiles and working link to /case-studies/techflow

tests.name: Testimonials Display
tests.description: Verify testimonials contain at least 2 entries with names and roles
steps: Verify each has author name, role, and company
tests.expected_result: At least 2 testimonials displayed with complete author information

tests.name: CTA Section Button
tests.description: Verify CTA section displays button linking to /contact
tests.expected_result: CTA button visible and links to /contact page

tests.name: Navigation Functionality
tests.description: Verify navigation is visible, sticky, and contains all required links
steps: Verify navigation is visible at top
Scroll down and verify navigation remains sticky
Check all links: Home, Services, Portfolio, About, Contact
tests.expected_result: Navigation is sticky and contains all required links

tests.name: Footer Renders Correctly
tests.description: Verify footer renders with site links and copyright
tests.expected_result: Footer displays with all links and copyright information

tests.name: Contact Form Multi-Step Flow
tests.description: Verify contact form progresses through all 4 steps correctly
tests.expected_result: Form completes all steps and shows success message

tests.name: Form Validation
tests.description: Verify contact form validation using Zod schema
steps: Try to proceed without selecting service
Enter less than 20 characters in project details
tests.expected_result: Form validation prevents submission and displays appropriate error messages

tests.name: Skip Link Functionality
tests.description: Verify skip link is first tab stop and jumps to main content
steps: Verify focus moves to main content
tests.expected_result: Skip link works correctly and moves focus to main content

tests.name: Keyboard Navigation
tests.description: Verify all interactive elements are keyboard accessible
steps: Use Tab key to navigate through all interactive elements
tests.expected_result: All interactive elements are keyboard accessible with visible focus

tests.name: ARIA Labels and Landmarks
tests.description: Verify proper ARIA labels and HTML5 landmarks
steps: Verify header, main, footer landmarks exist
tests.expected_result: Proper semantic HTML and ARIA labels throughout page

tests.name: Color Contrast Ratio
tests.description: Verify text/background contrast meets WCAG AA standards (≥ 4.5:1 for normal text, ≥ 3:1 for large text)
tests.expected_result: All text meets WCAG AA contrast requirements

tests.name: Image Alt Text
tests.description: Verify all images have appropriate alt text
steps: Verify meaningful images have descriptive alt
Verify decorative images have empty alt
Check logo alt text in social proof
tests.expected_result: All images have appropriate alt attributes

tests.name: Reduced Motion Support
tests.description: Verify animations respect prefers-reduced-motion
steps: Verify animations are disabled or reduced
tests.expected_result: Animations respect reduced motion preference

tests.name: Heading Hierarchy
tests.description: Verify proper heading structure with one unique h1
steps: Verify logical heading order (h1, h2, h3, etc.)
tests.expected_result: One h1 and logical heading hierarchy throughout page

tests.name: Mobile Menu Accessibility
tests.description: Verify mobile menu is keyboard accessible with focus trap
steps: Verify focus trap when menu is open
Verify focus returns to menu button
tests.expected_result: Mobile menu is fully keyboard accessible with proper focus management

tests.name: Axe-Core Automated Scan
tests.description: Run axe-core accessibility scanner and verify no serious+ violations
steps: Load page in browser with axe extension
Filter for serious and critical issues
tests.expected_result: Zero serious or critical axe-core violations

tests.name: Largest Contentful Paint (LCP)
tests.description: Verify LCP ≤ 2.5s on throttled mobile (Fast 3G or 4G Slow)
tests.expected_result: LCP ≤ 2.5s on mobile simulation

tests.name: Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS)
tests.description: Verify CLS ≤ 0.1 with no late layout shifts
steps: Check for layout shifts during logo loads
Verify no shifts in hero section
tests.expected_result: CLS ≤ 0.1 throughout page

tests.name: Interaction to Next Paint (INP)
tests.description: Verify INP ≤ 200ms on mobile
tests.expected_result: INP ≤ 200ms for all interactions

tests.name: JavaScript Bundle Size
tests.description: Verify JS bundle for landing route ≤ 150KB gzipped
steps: Check gzipped size of main bundle
tests.expected_result: Landing page JS bundle ≤ 150KB gzipped

tests.name: Image Optimization
tests.description: Verify all images use next/image with static dimensions
steps: Verify lazy loading for off-screen images
tests.expected_result: All images optimized with next/image and prevent CLS

tests.name: Lighthouse Performance Score
tests.description: Run Lighthouse and verify performance score ≥ 90
tests.expected_result: Lighthouse performance score ≥ 90 on mobile

tests.name: Meta Tags Present
tests.description: Verify title, description, OpenGraph, and Twitter Card tags are present
steps: Check OpenGraph tags (og:title, og:description, og:type, og:url)
tests.expected_result: All SEO meta tags present and within length limits

tests.name: Heading Structure
tests.description: Verify one unique h1 and semantic heading order
tests.expected_result: One h1 and proper heading hierarchy

tests.name: Robots and Indexing
tests.description: Verify robots meta tag allows indexing
steps: Verify index and follow are set
Check for canonical tag if needed
tests.expected_result: Page is indexable by search engines

tests.name: External Link Security
tests.description: Verify external links have rel='noopener noreferrer'
steps: Verify rel='noopener noreferrer' on target='_blank' links
tests.expected_result: All external links have proper security attributes

tests.name: No Sensitive Data Exposure
tests.description: Verify no PII or sensitive data in landing page source
steps: Verify no API keys in client code
Check console for logged sensitive data
tests.expected_result: No sensitive information exposed in client code

tests.name: Form Security
tests.description: Verify contact form has proper validation and sanitization
tests.expected_result: Form properly validates and sanitizes all inputs

tests.name: Mobile Layout (375px)
tests.description: Verify layout works correctly on mobile devices (iPhone SE, etc.)
tests.expected_result: Layout is usable and readable on 375px viewport

tests.name: Tablet Layout (768px - 1024px)
tests.description: Verify layout works correctly on tablet devices
tests.expected_result: Layout adapts correctly for tablet viewports

tests.name: Desktop Layout (1440px - 1920px)
tests.description: Verify layout works correctly on desktop displays
steps: Verify content is centered and readable
tests.expected_result: Layout looks professional on large desktop displays

tests.name: Chrome Compatibility
tests.description: Verify full functionality in latest Chrome
tests.expected_result: Full functionality in Chrome

tests.name: Safari Compatibility
tests.description: Verify full functionality in latest Safari
tests.expected_result: Full functionality in Safari

tests.name: Firefox Compatibility
tests.description: Verify full functionality in latest Firefox
tests.expected_result: Full functionality in Firefox

tests.name: Edge Compatibility
tests.description: Verify full functionality in latest Edge
tests.expected_result: Full functionality in Edge

tests.name: CTA Click Tracking
tests.description: Verify cta_click event fires with correct parameters
steps: Open browser console or analytics debugger
tests.expected_result: CTA clicks tracked with correct location parameter

tests.name: Service Card Click Tracking
tests.description: Verify service_card_click event fires with service name
steps: Verify event fires with correct service_name
tests.expected_result: Service card clicks tracked with service names

tests.name: Case Study Click Tracking
tests.description: Verify case_study_click event fires with case details
steps: Verify event fires with case_id and case_name
tests.expected_result: Case study clicks tracked correctly
